translations: n.大惊小怪，紧张不安；（为小事）大发牢骚；反对，抗议；繁琐的手续，麻烦
v.大惊小怪，瞎忙活；过分体贴（fuss over）；使烦恼，烦扰

phrs.translation: 大惊小怪，小题大做；吵吵闹闹
焦虑；过分关心，过分体贴

sentences.sentence: Don't fuss, Mum, everything is all right.
sentences.translation: 别瞎操心了，妈妈，一切都好。

sentences.sentence: All that fuss over a few pounds!
sentences.translation: 为几英镑就那么大惊小怪的！

sentences.sentence: It was all a fuss about nothing.
sentences.translation: 这完全是无谓地自寻烦恼。
